articles.title: Suspense As South African Police Await New Orders On Zuma’s Arrest - Channels Television

articles.title: EFF denies smuggling guns to Eswatini | Citypress - News24
articles.description: The Eswatini government has allegedly told the Southern African Development Community (SADC) that guns smuggled from South Africa are being used to kill its citizens.

articles.title: Woke culture and 'kasi heroes': How African luxury goods are taking SA - and the world - by storm | Fin24 - News24
articles.description: Africa's well-heeled consumers and the rest of the world are embracing African luxury brands more. This has seen brands like Rich Mnisi and Maxhosa Africa soar to new heights.

articles.title: Fall of Tigray capital: Ethiopia on the brink of meltdown without genuine negotiations - Daily Maverick
articles.description: Unless there is a political solution soon, Ethiopia is on the brink of descending into an ethnic meltdown similar to the disintegration of Yugoslavia, one that will redraw the map of the Horn of Africa and cause reverberations throughout the continent.
